task.name: importfits
task.shortdescription: Convert an image FITS file into a CASA image
task.description:
Convert an image FITS file into a CASA image
Keyword arguments: fitsimage -- Name of input image FITS file default: none; example='3C273XC1.fits' imagename -- Name of output CASA image default: none; example: imagename='3C273XC1.image' whichrep -- If fits image has multiple coordinate reps, choose one. default: 0 means first; example: whichrep=1 whichhdu -- If fits file contains multiple images, choose this one (0 == first) default=-1 use the first valid one; example: whichhdu=1 zeroblanks -- Set blanked pixels to zero (not NaN) default=True; example: zeroblanks=True overwrite -- Overwrite pre-existing imagename default=False; example: overwrite=True defaultaxes -- Add the default 4D coordinate axes where they are missing default=False, example: defaultaxes=True defaultaxesvalues -- List of values to assign to added degenerate axes when defaultaxes==True (ra,dec,freq,stokes) default = [], example: defaultaxesvalues=['13.5h', '-2.5deg', '88.5GHz', 'Q'] beam -- List of values to be used to define the synthesized beam [BMAJ,BMIN,BPA] (as in the FITS keywords) default = [] (i.e.take from FITS file), example: beam=['0.35arcsec', '0.24arcsec', '25deg']

param.name: fitsimage
param.description: Name of input image FITS file

param.name: whichrep
param.description: If fits image has multiple coordinate reps, choose one.

param.name: whichhdu
param.description: If its file contains multiple images, choose one (0 = first HDU, -1 = first valid image).

param.name: zeroblanks
param.description: Set blanked pixels to zero (not NaN)

param.name: defaultaxes
param.description: Add the default 4D coordinate axes where they are missing

param.name: defaultaxesvalues
param.description: List of values to assign to added degenerate axes when defaultaxes==True (ra,dec,freq,stokes)

param.name: beam
param.description: List of values to be used to define the synthesized beam [BMAJ,BMIN,BPA] (as in the FITS keywords)
